tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I first visited the doctor for my toothache. She not only made me feel comfortable on my visit, but she explained the problem to me in layman's term. Dr. Spina is a thorough professional and she went step by step:1.  She explained and examined the situation. 2. Took immediate measures to stop further damage to teeth. 3. She explained me the treatment plan.This review is after I got my Root Canal Treatment done, Dr. Spina spoke to me, comforting me throughout the Root Canal.. She explained the need to do it without anaesthesia. And true to her words, there was no pain after the treatment. Another wonderful thing is, she accepts online payments via Google Pay too which is really relaxing for people like me who hardly carry cash. I am pretty satisfied with the Doctor and she finished my treatment earliest on my request as I was travelling next week. I would definitely recommend her to my family members and even to other people.
reply_text: Thank you soo much bhakti for your kind words.my pleasure.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Spina Mehta has the expertise of a good dentist and the warmth of great human being. She put at ease at every step and her style of treatment greatly exceeded my expectations. Wish there were many more dentist with the kind of empathy Dr Spina has. Best wishes to her and her team.
reply_text: Thank you soo much for kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I got implant, gum cutting from my caps, root canals and a few fillings. All of this happened over a course of 4 months. To say the least it was very well planned by Dr. Spina. She always used to check with me after my treatment whether it used to pain or no. My overall experience was excellent. Will definitely recommend my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Caries,Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: I visited doctor for pain in molar and blackened front tooth. Doctor explained the issue thoroughlyand in such way that it doesn't scare you. There are cavities in multiple molars which are cleaned and filled with least discomfort. On observation of front incisor, it is found that infection has reached root, which requires RCT which is done perfectly with no pain at all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

She explains  every procedure thoroughly n eases you into it very smoothly! The clinic is clean n hygeinic! The staff is helpful n pleasant! I would highly recommend The Dental Bay for every dental procedure!!!

review: Dr. Spina Mehta is a warm, friendly and efficient dentist. She explained my surgical procedure so simply and reminded on phone the pre-surgery precautions too. The surgery of impacted and infected wisdom tooth went so well and was absolutely painless. She also gave post surgery advice very clearly and regularly followed up on phone and WhatsApp to ask about the well being. I‚Äôm very happy and satisfied with such a rare find esp in a place like MUMBAI. Touchwood.
reply_text: Thank you poojaji for the kind words .

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Easy to approach. Honest advise.
She checked and explained the need for treatment and the course of action required. The effects of ignoring the treatment was told.
The dental cleaning was done very well which the previous dentist's did not do.
The fees were reasonable.
The appointment time was adhered to.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words anand.it was a pleasure doing your dental treatment

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I have been a patient of Dr.Spina for a year now. On more than one occasion I had to call her emergency number outside of regular clinic hours, and each time she has returned my call within minutes. She really cares about her patients and is great at getting you in quick if you are in an emergency. I am always greeted by name by the receptionist. The staff is friendly and professional. During procedures, my comfort level is of primary concern. She keeps current with the latest procedures and equipment using digital x-ray, rotary root canal instruments etc. Dr. Spina and her technicians have my full confidence.
I recommend her to all my friends and neighbors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
